description:
Bespoke sophistication has a new address… between the beach, the strip and the village! Professionally renovated with no detail spared, this sunlit 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse offers an impeccable standard of beachfront living with exceptional accommodation, a northerly courtyard wrapping round to the rear, and the finest selection of designer finishes!

Tucked to the rear of an exclusive landmark group (where a magnificent heritage tree greets you at the entrance), this ultra-accommodating home shines with sunny living-dining opening out to a northerly entertainer’s deck, a luxe master bedroom with its own private ensuite, and a generous home office (or genuine third bedroom) for the ultimate flexible lifestyle. Stretched across satin-finish hardwood floors and framed by contemporary dado panelling, this expertly styled home stars a quality appliance kitchen with Bosch dishwasher, luminous stone benchtops and fully-tiled bathrooms with deluxe walk-in showers.

But it’s the clever little details that really complete this design-led gem! With a well-appointed European laundry, custom terrazzo shelves to match the entry patio, a built-in media nook in the master bedroom, and matte black fixtures (even for the light switches), every detail has been finessed in this polished beachside home. Designed for effortless living throughout the seasons, there’s also reverse cycle air-conditioning, zoned ducted heating and an outdoor shower in the courtyard!

Set in serene communal gardens with a sizable garage plus easy-access visitor parking, even the location is perfectly accommodating – halfway between Hampton’s stylish strip and Sandringham’s vibrant village, an equally easy walk to either station, and only 400m to the beach! Pick-up your morning coffee from Brown Cow, explore the bay trails in the afternoon, and return home each day to unmatched designer style! For more information about this designer beachside address, contact Craig Harrison at Buxton Hampton East on 0459 991 120
